originalText.text: George is truly great: caring, knowledgable, and insightful. I have seen him over the years for a few different injuries and I find myself getting better each time and not needing more PT! I've had chiropractors who I went to for YEARS and didn't get the relief George can deliver in a few sessions.

text.text: George is truly great: caring, knowledgable, and insightful. I have seen him over the years for a few different injuries and I find myself getting better each time and not needing more PT! I've had chiropractors who I went to for YEARS and didn't get the relief George can deliver in a few sessions.

originalText.text: I had an ankle injury with  surgery and currently I need physical therapy for long time. I am very happy that I found Mr. George Panayotidis's place. His location is not far from my home and it is in a very nice, old building. My ankle responds very well to his treatment. He is using a special equipment with electrodes which I did not see in any other PT places where I went before. Using the electrodes, he is applying small electric fields at the area of the injury and I really feel how my ankle is rapidly improving with each visit to his place. The two young ladies who are assisting him are also very nice. Beside using the device with the electrodes Mr Panayotidis can understand very well my surgery and ankle problems and his massage around my damaged ankle is very good and  helping my ankle to improve. I also like the physical exercises he is recommended for my ankle using his equipment such as bicycle and elliptic walking.

originalText.text: My mother was referred to Dr. Panayotidis for physical therapy in her upper back,  The  Doctor and his staff  are very courteous and professional.  They also follow the CDC recommendations for Corona Virus Safety.  My mother recommends this place very highly.

originalText.text: My husband was a patient of Mr. George and he was extremely personal, yet compassionate.  And we recommend him to everyone.  Hes the best..

originalText.text: It's a pretty good place for physical therapy; but I am not going back.I didn't like the attitude of one of his assistants when I went to handle a prescription for more physical therapy.
